issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] ParquetScanExec launches threads too early
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9726](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9726). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ParquetScanExec launches threads in partitions() ahead of execute() being called on those partitions. This results on "too many open files" when there are many partitions.
